title: Is the dua after the adhan only for men?
transcript: uh she says this I mean you can take it and have a look at it says men can recite certain supplications after the aan to seek intercession from the prophet sallallahu alaihi wasallam uh on the day of judgment so they can have some intercession What alternative is it for the women I think she's she's saying the the Dua after thean it's it's for both it's not for men there are not to my knowledge there are no supplication in Islam that are only for men mhm supplications and prayers they are all for men men and women alike does
